name: Zombie Survivors 1
description:
Introduce

Come and experience the joy of bullet screen games!
Become a zombie hunter!
This is an action pigeon type bullet screen shooting game. In a cartoonish forest, players face waves of zombies and try to survive by defeating them with their weapons.

Game Features

Faced with a variety of zombies, players can shoot zombies with guns, blast them with grenades and oil barrels, and place walls to block zombies and bullets.
In wave after wave of dead tide, trying to survive, win the game.

Players can sprint to avoid zombies and bullets.

The picture of the game cartoon fresh, sound effect beautiful, all kinds of zombie charmingly naive.
The constant presence of zombie bosses adds to the playability.
Defeat the final BOSS and finish the game!

Multielement Weapon

The player starts with a normal single-shot rifle, but automatically changes weapons when picking up other weapons.
There are machine guns, shotguns, fireball guns, laser guns, and the corresponding super machine guns, Super shotguns, super Fireball guns, super laser guns, and so on.

There are hidden weapons waiting to be discovered.

Level Up

Upgrade weapons with a variety of options, including bullet damage, shooting frequency, player movement speed, etc.

When one reaches its full level, a normal weapon evolves into a super weapon.
